verbs.description: le’veon bell still [V: has] had no contact with steelers le’veon bell is expected to report to the pittsburgh steelers at some point during the week 7 bye so he can play against the cleveland browns on oct 28 but he has apparently not informed the team of his intentions according to espn adam schefter bell has not spoken with any steelers players or officials to let them know when he will be returning the star running back has kept everyone in the dark about his status and plans to continue pittsburgh steelers bell cleveland browns steelers
